article_title: What is the genocide case against Israel?
sentence: Hundreds  of  Hamas  gunmen  crossed  from  the  Gaza  Strip  into  southern  Israel,  killing  about  1,200  people,  mainly  civilians,  and  taking  252  hostages  back  to  Gaza.

article_title: What is the genocide case against Israel?
sentence: Since  Israel  launched  its  military  campaign  against  Hamas  in  response,  more  than  35,800  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: What is the genocide case against Israel?
sentence: Correction  13th  February:  This  article  wrongly  reported  that  about  1,300  people  had  been  killed  following  the  7th  October  attack  by  Hamas.

article_title: What is the genocide case against Israel?
sentence: This  was  based  on  counting  those  who  later  died  from  their  injuries  in  addition  to  the  figure  of  more  than  1,200.
